description.zh-cn: 中国文化大革命期间的一起重大政治案件，旨在打击以刘少奇为首的中共领导人。
description.en: A major political case during the Cultural Revolution in China, aimed at targeting CPC leaders headed by Liu Shaoqi.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国历史上的一场政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in the history of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导人，文化大革命期间的重要人物，六十一人叛徒集团案的主要制造者之一。
description.en: A leader of the Communist Party of China, a key figure during the Cultural Revolution, and one of the main fabricators of the Case of the 61 Renegades.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华人民共和国主席，文化大革命期间被打倒。
description.en: Former Chairman of the People's Republic of China, who was purged during the Cultural Revolution.

en: Northern Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在北方地区的派出机构。
description.en: A dispatched agency of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China in the northern region.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党政治人物，曾向刘少奇建议将在押干部保释出狱。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China, who suggested to Liu Shaoqi to bail out imprisoned cadres.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期主要领导人之一，曾任中共中央总书记，批准了刘少奇保释干部的决定。
description.en: One of the early main leaders of the Communist Party of China, who served as the General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and approved Liu Shaoqi's decision to bail out cadres.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，“六十一人叛徒集团案”的主要受害者。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a main victim of the 'Case of the 61 Renegades'.

nodes.id: 中共中央关于印发薄一波、刘澜涛、安子文、杨献珍等人自首叛变材料的批示

zh-cn: 中共中央关于印发薄一波、刘澜涛、安子文、杨献珍等人自首叛变材料的批示

description.zh-cn: 将六十一人出狱事件定性为“自首叛变”的中共中央文件，正式启动了此案。
description.en: A CPC Central Committee document that labeled the release of the 61 individuals as 'capitulation and betrayal', officially launching the case.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理，在六十一人案初期曾向毛泽东报告称中央知晓此事。
description.en: Former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, who reported to Mao Zedong at the beginning of the Case of the 61 that the Central Committee was aware of the matter.

description.zh-cn: 六十一人案受害者之一，在文革中被迫害致死。
description.en: One of the victims of the Case of the 61, who was persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 六十一人案受害者之一，在文革中被迫害致死。
description.en: One of the victims of the Case of the 61, who was persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导核心，其复出推动了冤假错案的平反。
description.en: The core of the second generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China, whose political comeback promoted the rehabilitation of unjust, false, and wrongful cases.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共中央总书记，主持了包括六十一人案在内的大量冤假错案的平反工作。
description.en: Former General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, who presided over the rehabilitation of a large number of unjust, false, and wrongful cases, including the Case of the 61.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导人之一，曾阻挠为六十一人叛徒集团案平反。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China, who once obstructed the rehabilitation of the Case of the 61 Renegades.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导人之一，曾阻挠为六十一人叛徒集团案平反。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China, who once obstructed the rehabilitation of the Case of the 61 Renegades.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导人之一，曾阻挠为六十一人叛徒集团案平反。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China, who once obstructed the rehabilitation of the Case of the 61 Renegades.

en: Organization Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会负责党组织和干部工作的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for party organization and cadre work.

en: 3rd Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的一次重要会议，是改革开放的开端，也为平反冤假错案创造了政治条件。
description.en: An important meeting of the Communist Party of China, marking the beginning of the reform and opening-up, and creating the political conditions for rehabilitating unjust, false, and wrongful cases.

nodes.id: 中共中央转发中央组织部〈关于“六十一人案件”的调查报告〉的通知

zh-cn: 中共中央转发中央组织部〈关于“六十一人案件”的调查报告〉的通知

description.zh-cn: 为“六十一人叛徒集团案”彻底平反的中共中央文件。
description.en: The CPC Central Committee document that completely rehabilitated the 'Case of the 61 Renegades'.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，“六十一人叛徒集团案”的主要受害者。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a main victim of the 'Case of the 61 Renegades'.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，“六十一人叛徒集团案”的主要受害者。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, and a main victim of the 'Case of the 61 Renegades'.

description.zh-cn: 六十一人叛徒集团案是在文化大革命期间制造的一起大案。
description.en: The Case of the 61 Renegades was a major case fabricated during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 康生向毛泽东写信，怀疑刘少奇等人“自首出狱”的决定，推动了该案的形成。
description.en: Kang Sheng wrote to Mao Zedong, questioning the decision for Liu Shaoqi and others to 'be released after confessing', which pushed forward the formation of the case.

description.zh-cn: 该案是为打击国家主席刘少奇一派的中共领导人而制造的。
description.en: This case was fabricated to attack the faction of CPC leaders headed by State Chairman Liu Shaoqi.

description.zh-cn: 薄一波是六十一人叛徒集团案的主要受害者之一，被定为“叛徒”。
description.en: Bo Yibo was one of the main victims of the Case of the 61 Renegades and was labeled a 'renegade'.

description.zh-cn: 1936年，刘少奇担任中共中央北方局书记。
description.en: In 1936, Liu Shaoqi served as the Secretary of the Northern Bureau of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 刘少奇听取了柯庆施的建议，决定将关押在北平的中共干部保释出狱。
description.en: Liu Shaoqi took Ke Qingshi's suggestion and decided to bail out the CPC cadres imprisoned in Beiping.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央总书记的张闻天代表党中央批准了刘少奇关于保释61名干部的决定。
description.en: Zhang Wentian, then General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, approved Liu Shaoqi's decision to bail out the 61 cadres on behalf of the Party Central Committee.

relationships.source: 中共中央关于印发薄一波、刘澜涛、安子文、杨献珍等人自首叛变材料的批示

description.zh-cn: 该文件将61人出狱事件定性为“自首叛变”，使案件正式成立。
description.en: This document defined the release of the 61 individuals as 'capitulation and betrayal', formally establishing the case.

description.zh-cn: 廖鲁言因六十一人案受到迫害，被折磨至死。
description.en: Liao Luyan was persecuted due to the Case of the 61 and was tortured to death.

description.zh-cn: 徐子荣因六十一人案受到迫害，被折磨至死。
description.en: Xu Zirong was persecuted due to the Case of the 61 and was tortured to death.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦主持平反冤假错案工作，决议为六十一人叛徒集团案平反。
description.en: Hu Yaobang presided over the work of rehabilitating unjust, false, and wrongful cases and resolved to reverse the verdict of the Case of the 61 Renegades.

description.zh-cn: 汪东兴阻挠胡耀邦为六十一人叛徒集团案平反，认为该案由毛泽东定性，不能翻案。
description.en: Wang Dongxing obstructed Hu Yaobang's efforts to rehabilitate the Case of the 61 Renegades, arguing that the case was decided by Mao Zedong and could not be overturned.

description.zh-cn: 纪登奎阻挠胡耀邦为六十一人叛徒集团案平反。
description.en: Ji Dengkui obstructed Hu Yaobang's efforts to rehabilitate the Case of the 61 Renegades.

description.zh-cn: 吴德阻挠胡耀邦为六十一人叛徒集团案平反。
description.en: Wu De obstructed Hu Yaobang's efforts to rehabilitate the Case of the 61 Renegades.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦指示中组部坚持对六十一人案进行调查以促成平反。
description.en: Hu Yaobang instructed the Central Organization Department to persist in investigating the Case of the 61 to facilitate its rehabilitation.

description.zh-cn: 在十一届三中全会前，汪东兴等人失势，为案件平反扫清了障碍。
description.en: Before the 3rd Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee, Wang Dongxing and others lost power, clearing the obstacles for the case's rehabilitation.

relationships.source: 中共中央转发中央组织部〈关于“六十一人案件”的调查报告〉的通知

description.zh-cn: 该文件正式为六十一人叛徒集团案彻底平反，称其为“一个大错案”。
description.en: This document officially and completely rehabilitated the Case of the 61 Renegades, calling it 'a major wrongful case'.
